content: परिवृत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Revolution; <ls>Śi. 10. 91.</ls> {@--2@} Return; turning back. {@--3@} Barter, exchange. {@--4@} End, termination. {@--5@} Surrounding. {@--6@} Staying or dwelling in a place. {@--7@} Contraction of the prepuce. {@--8@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech in which there is an exchange of a thing for what is equal, less or greater; परिवृत्तिर्विनिमयो योऽर्थानां स्यत्समासमैः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} दत्त्वा कटाक्षमेणाक्षी जग्राह हृदयं मम . मया तु हृदयं दत्त्वा गृहीतो मदनज्वरः .. <ls>S. D. 734.</ls> {@--9@} Substitution of one word for another without affecting the sense; as in शब्दपरिवृत्तिसहत्वं <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} in वृषध्वज, ध्वज may be substituted by लांछन or वाहन.
